// src/components/Layout.jsx import React, { useState } from 'react' import { Link, useNavigate, Outlet } from 'react-router-dom' import { ShoppingCart, User, Menu, Home, X } from 'lucide-react' import useAuth from '../hooks/useAuth' export default function Layout() { const [drawerOpen, setDrawerOpen] = useState(false) const { user, setUser } = useAuth() const navigate = useNavigate() const handleLogout = () => { localStorage.removeItem('token') setUser(null) setDrawerOpen(false) navigate('/') } return (
{/* Top Bar */}
{/* Drawer */} {drawerOpen && (
{user ? (
Hello, {user.username}
) : (
Welcome
)}
{user ? ( <> setDrawerOpen(false)} > Settings ) : ( setDrawerOpen(false)} > Sign In )}
setDrawerOpen(false)} />
)} {/* Main content area */}
) }
